name: Mining Space
description:
Play as a miner and mine ores. You only have a few seconds.

Beware though! Stay cautious of any mines that come in your way. They may hurt you if not mined properly.

CONTROLS

Press spacebar ONCE to mine an ore

Press spacebar TWICE when close to a mine

Wish you the best in not getting confused :D

My personal HIGH SCORE is 45.  Lemme know if u beat me!😄✌

Credits

This game was solely developed by me.

Game Theme Song: Underclocked by Eric Skiff

*A Submission to the Boundless Game Jam

**(y'all I know webGL build wud be better but for some reason it doesnt seem to work even when i have tried re importing the build several times. Hence i HAD to go with a downloadable file. Sorry for  the inconvenience)
